title: Ad Cloud Top Level Entity Attributes DataTypes
description: Defines common set of attributes across various entities defined on ad network platforms as well as adobe advertising cloud - for example campaign, adgroup, keywords and ads. This set of fields needs to be included in all schemas that defines an advertising entity object.

xdm:externalId.title: Network Entity ID
xdm:externalId.description: Unique identifier as represented by the network for the entity object.

xdm:networkId.title: Ad Cloud Search Engine or Network Identifier
xdm:networkId.description: Unique Internal identifier for the network primarily used for join with the aggregated data-set.

xdm:network.title: Name of the Search Engine Network
xdm:network.description: Network Name as defined by the search partners.

xdm:name.title: Name
xdm:name.description: Unique Name for the entity - e.g Campaign Name, Ad Group Name.

xdm:createdTime.title: Created Time of the entity in the Ad Cloud Platform
xdm:createdTime.description: Created Time of the entity in the Ad Cloud Platform.This differs from creation time of the entity in external advertising platform partners.

xdm:modifiedTime.title: Modified Time for the given entity in Ad Cloud Platform
xdm:modifiedTime.description: Modified Time of the entity in the Ad Cloud Platform. This differs from modified time of the entity in external advertising platform partners.
